#include <cstdlib> 
#include <cctype> 
#include <cstring> 
#include <cstdio> 
#include <cmath> 
#include <algorithm> 
#include <vector> 
#include <string> 
#include <iostream> 
#include <sstream> 
#include <map> 
#include <set> 
#include <queue> 
#include <stack> 
#include <fstream> 
#include <numeric> 
#include <iomanip> 
#include <bitset> 
#include <list> 
#include <stdexcept> 
#include <functional> 
#include <utility> 
#include <ctime> 
#define p(x) cout<<#x " = "<<x<< " "
#define pr(x) cout<<#x " "<<x<<endl
#define pb push_back

using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
    int t,n,a,m;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    { scanf("%d",&n);
      a=0;
      while(n--)
      { scanf("%d",&m);
        a=max(a,m);
      }
      printf("%d\n",a);
    }
    return 0;
}
